owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Alba Fern√°ndez Izquierdo
Andrea Cimmino
owl:Ontology.terms:title: OpenADR ontology
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: This ontology describes the openADR protocol based on the documentation provided by the openADR Profile B

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A spatial representation for a given feature.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Geometry

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially contains the object SpatialObject
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a VE, Resource or Asset with the Group of targets associated
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: belongs to

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship to cancel a report
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: cancels

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a target and its components
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains
Relation between a target and the asset it contains
contains asset
Relation between a target and the resource it contains
contains resource
Relation between a target and the VEN it contains
contains VEN

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an event and its metadata
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: event descriptor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an entity and its service area target
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has area target

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Duration of an event
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has duration

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link between an event and its status
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has event status

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This is the time interval between sampled data in a report request
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has granularity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an entity and its group target
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has group target

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a report and the load control state to enable a VEN to report on its load control state that corresponds to a LOAD_CONTROL signal that might be sent to a VEN.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has load control state

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Maximum period of time
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has max period

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Minimum period of time
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has min period

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:isDefinedBy: Link between a report and its payload
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has payload

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a report and its payload
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has report payload

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the sampling rate of a report
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has sampling rate

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Duration of a signal interval
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: interval duration

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a signal and its payload
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has signal payload

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a signal and its signal type
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has signal type

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an entity and its target
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has target

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Typical value of an interval
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has typical value

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link between a report and the measurement included in the payload
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: includes measurement

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an entity and its signal
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has signal

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between the report and its subject
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: involves subject

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an entity an its active period
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has active period

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Linked between a report and the properties it measure
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is associated to property

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Availability of a target
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is available during

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link between a signal and the interval where it is active
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has interval

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a payload and its descriptor
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is described in

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a Resource and a VEN
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is managed by

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Reporting interval of a report
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is reported during interval

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a schedule and a target
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is schedule of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between reports
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is specifier in

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a VEN and a Resource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: manages

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between Opt and the planification of a target
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: plans

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between the node and an object it receives
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: receives

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a target and its availability
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: refers to target

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link to the source of a report
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: report data source

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a report and its metadata
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: report descriptor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Subject of a report
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: report subject

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between the node and the report it requests
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: requests

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a node and an object it requires
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: requires

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A link between a node and the objects it sends
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: sends

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A link between a node and the event it sends
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: sends event

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A link between a node and the opt it sends
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: sends opt

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A link between a node and the report it sends
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: sends report
relation between the report and its specification
specifies report

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the likely variability of the prediction and the error of a reading
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has accuracy

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A statistical probability that a reported data point is accurate
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has confidence

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A URI identifying a DR Program
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: market context

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Time of modification of an event
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has modification date time

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number which is incremented each time an event is modified.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has modification number

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: It indicates why an event was modified
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has modification reason

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The priority of the event in relation to other events (The lower the number higher the priority. A value of zero (0) indicates no priority, which is the lowest priority by default).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has priority

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Metadata about the Readings, such as mean or derived
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: reading type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A scaling factor for the base unit of measure for a report
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has scale code

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Attribute to determine whether or not data is sampled as it changes
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: is on change

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the payload is online
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: is online

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Attribute to indicate if a response is required to acknowledge the object
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: is response required

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Attribute to indicate if the event is for testing purposes
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: is test event

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The starting time for the activity, data, or state change
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: starts

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represents the top-level feature type. This class is equivalent to GFI_Feature defined in ISO 19156:2011, and it is superclass of all feature types
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Feature

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class represents the top-level geometry type. This class is equivalent to the UML class GM_Object defined in ISO 19107, and it is superclass of all geometry types.
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Geometry

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class spatial-object represents everything that can have a spatial representation. It is superclass of feature and geometry.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SpatialObject

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A point, typically described using a coordinate system relative to Earth, such as WGS84.
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Anything with spatial extent, i.e. size, shape, or position. e.g. people, places, bowling balls, as well as abstract areas like cubes
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Spatial thing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Duration of a temporal extent expressed as a number scaled by a temporal unit
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Time duration

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A temporal entity with zero extent or duration
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Instant

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A temporal entity with non-zero extent or duration, for which the value of the beginning and end are different
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Interval

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A temporal entity with zero extent or duration
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Temporal Entity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A unit of measure is a definite magnitude of a quantity, defined and adopted by convention and/or by law. It is used as a standard for measurement of the same quantity, where any other value of the quantity can be expressed as a simple multiple of the unit of measure. For example, length is a quantity; the metre is a unit of length that represents a definite predetermined length. When we say 10 metre (or 10 m), we actually mean 10 times the definite predetermined length called "metre".
owl:Class.rdfs:label: unit of measure

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the amount of energy from a resource that was bid into a program
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bid energy setpoint signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal that represents the price that was bid by the resource
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bid energy signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the amount of load that was bid by a resource into a program
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bid load setpoint signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal that represents the amount of load that was bid by a resource into a program
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bid load signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the price that was bid by the resource
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bid absolute price

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal that represents the price that was bid by the resource
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bid price signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the delta amount of energy that should be contained in a storage resource from where it currently is.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Charge state delta signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the percentage of full charge that the storage resource should be at.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Charge state multiplier signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is used to either charge or discharge a certain amount of energy from a storage resource until its charge state reaches a certain level.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Charge state setpoint signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal used to dispatch storage resources
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Charge state signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: These reports are used to report actual data that may be measured or calculated.
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the demand charge expressed in absolute terms
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Demand charge absolute price signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is a multiplier to the existing demand charge
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Demand charge multiplier price signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is a delta change to the existing demand charge
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Demand charge relative price signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal for the demand charge
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Demand charge signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the cost of electricity expressed in absolute terms
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Electicity absolute price signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is a multiplier to the existing cost of electricity
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Electricity multiplier price signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is a delta change to the existing price of electricity
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Electricity relative price signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal for the price of electricity
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Electricity price signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the cost of energy expressed in absolute terms
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Energy absolute price signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is a multiplier to the existing cost of energy
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Energy multiplier price signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is a delta change to the existing price of energy
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Energy relative price signal
Energy price signal
Signal for the price of energy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An event is a notification from the utility to demand side resources requesting load shed starting at a specific time, over a specified duration, and may include targeting information designating specific resources that should participate in the event
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Event

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Part of the OpenADR event object that describes metadata about the event, such as program name and event priority
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Event descriptor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Status of an OpenADR event
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Event status

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is usage history that can be transmitted using the well known GREEN BUTTON standard payloads
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Green button report

owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: Target of a signal or event
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Group

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is a type of data report in which the history of the data point values is logged and can be subsequently requested
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: History report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: These are logs of usage data that are typically logged by VEN‚Äôs and can be queried by the VTN
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: History usage report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Units for the data in the report
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OASIS Energy Market Information Exchange (eMIX) standard
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Item

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is an instruction for the load controller to operate at a level that is some percentage of its maximum load consumption capacity. This can be mapped to specific load controllers to do things like duty cycling. Note that 1.0 refers to 100% consumption. In the case of simple ON/OFF type devices then 0 = OFF and 1 = ON.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Load control capacity signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete integer levels that are relative to normal operations where 0 is normal operations. There is no requirement to link the setpoints to specific load consumption values, but the intention is that the higher the setpoint the less load is consumed. Note that these are controller set points that can be mapped at the VEN side to something as simple as thermostat temperature set point offsets.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Load control level offset signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Percentage change from normal operations. The percentage does not refer to specific load consumptions values, but to load control operation levels. The lower the percentage the less load is consumed.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Load control percent offset signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Load controller set points. There is no requirement to link the setpoints to specific load consumption values. Note that these are generic controller set points and can be mapped at the VEN side to something as simple as specific thermostat temperature set points.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Load control setpoint signal
Load control signal
Signal for to set the load control to values that are relative to the load controller and its output capacity.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The LoadControlState attributes are meant to mirror the LOAD_CONTROL signal attributes meaning that for each LOAD_CONTROL signal type there is a corresponding attribute in the LoadControlState of a report.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Load control state

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is used to dispatch loads to some offset from an agreed upon baseline. Note that the baseline may be the current power consumption.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Load dispatch delta signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is used to specify the load in terms of discrete levels.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Load dispatch level signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is used to dispatch loads as some multiple of power against some agreed upon baseline. Note that the baseline may be the current power consumption.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Load dispatch multiplier signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is used to dispatch loads to a specific amount
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Load dispatch setpoint signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Instructions are used to set the load values that can be expressed in terms of the desired load
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Load dispatch signal

owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
The metadata report can contain a specification for one or more type of reports, each report having its own set of report descriptors and specifications
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Metadata report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Element that interacts with resources in the environment
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Node

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The expected response from the demand side resource owner upon receipt of an event.
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Opt

owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Opt In

owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Opt Out

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Report sent from a VEN to a VTN to report the energy consumption or the status of Resources connected to the VEN
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Part of the OpenADR report object that describes the data included in the descriptor report
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Report data descriptor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Part of the OpenADR report object that includes the data sent to a node
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Report data payload

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Part of the OpenADR report object that describes metadata about the report
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Report descriptor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Payload associated to every report
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Report payload

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Part of the OpenADR report object that describes the status of the descriptor report
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Report status descriptor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Part of the OpenADR report object that includes the status of the payload report
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Report status payload

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Entity that is enrolled in the DR Programs and is capable of delivering some sort of change to their load profile in response to receiving a DR signal from a VTN.
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Resource

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The average number of samples obtained in one second
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sampling rate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Schedule of a target
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Schedule

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Service Area expresses locations or geographic regions relevant to price communication
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OASIS Energy Market Information Exchange (EMIX)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Service Area

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The actionable information contained in an event such as electricity pricing or specific levels of load shed requested that typically trigger some preprogrammed load shed behavior by the recipient of the event.
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Interval of time where a signal is active
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Signal Interval

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Type of a signal
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Signal Type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal for signal levels
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Simple signal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The term telemetry in the context of OpenADR refers to data that is reported periodically in real time
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Telemetry report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is usage data that is periodically reported from the VEN to the VTN in real time
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Telemetry status report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the status of a resource, which may be periodically reported from the VEN to the VTN
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Specification Profile B
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Telemetry usage report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the OpenADR Virtual End Node that is used to interact with the VTN
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Virtual End Node (VEN)

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the OpenADR Virtual Top Node that is used to interact with the Resources enrolled in the DR Programs.
owl:Class.rdfs:isDefinedBy: OpenADR 2.0 Demand Response Program Implementation Guide
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Virtual Top Node (VTN)
